name: Fido
notes: Very gassy, no playtime for one hour after eating.

name: Cujo
notes: Needs to take prednisone, 10mg, with food daily.

name: Mutt
notes: Enjoys his blanket very much - make sure he has it at all times.

name: Lady
notes: Very shy and will bite when stressed. Approach with caution.

name: Tramp
notes: Wipe paws before entering kennel after playtime as he is prone to bacterial infections on his paws.

name: Clifford
notes: Very large and vey excitable - will need lots of one on one playtime.

name: Snoopy
notes: Do not be alarmed by lethargic behavior - she sleeps often.
